title: Conizonia bodoani
text: Conizonia bodoani is a species of <a href="beetle">beetle</a> in the family <a href="Cerambycidae">Cerambycidae</a>. It was described by <a href="Maurice%20Pic">Maurice Pic</a> in 1912, originally under the genus "<a href="Phytoecia">Phytoecia</a>". It is known from <a href="Azerbaijan">Azerbaijan</a>, <a href="Turkey">Turkey</a> and <a href="Iran">Iran</a>.
